    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    AdminHomePage
    AdminPage class represents the user interface for the admin user.
    AdminSetupPage
    The SetupAdmin class handles the setup process for creating an administrator account.
    Answer
    Represents an answer in a Q and A system Contains information about the answer content, author, and associated question
    AnswersList
    A class that manages a collection of Answer objects.
    AnswersListTest
    A class that manages a collection of Question objects.
    AnswerTest
    Test class for the Answer model Contains unit tests for CRUD operations and other functionality of the Answer class
    DatabaseHelper
    The DatabaseHelper class is responsible for managing the connection to the database, performing operations such as user registration, login validation, and handling invitation codes.
    FirstPage
    FirstPage class represents the initial screen for the first user.
    ForgotPasswordPage
     
    InstructorHomePage
     
    InvitationPage
    InvitePage class represents the page where an admin can generate an invitation code.
    LinkQuestionTest
    Test class for link question class Tests the ability to link questions to posed questions
    OneTimePasswordPage
     
    PasswordEvaluator
     
    PrivateMessage
    Represents a messaging system form a posed question.
    PrivatemessageTest
    Test for ability it send a private message after a question
    Question
    Represents a question in the Q and A system.
    QuestionsList
    Manages a collection of Question objects and provides operations for manipulating questions.
    QuestionsListTest
    Test class for QuestionsList functionality Tests the management and searching of questions in the Q and A system
    QuestionTest
    Test class for Question model functionality Tests creation, reading, updating, and various operations on Question objects
    Review
    Allows reviewer to leave a review on a question
    ReviewerHomePage
     
    ReviewerRating
    Represents a review rating system for the user
    ReviewerRequestStatus
    Represents the statues of the request send in by a user to become a reviewer
    Reviewerstatestest
    tests outcome of request to become a reviewer
    ReviewFeedback
    Represents a way to check feedback on reviewers
    ReviewsListPage
     
    SetupAccountPage
    SetupAccountPage class handles the account setup process for new users.
    SetupLoginSelectionPage
    The SetupLoginSelectionPage class allows users to choose between setting up a new account or logging into an existing account.
    StaffHomePage
     
    StartCSE360
     
    StudentHomePage
     
    StyleConstants
     
    TrustedReviewersPage
     
    TrustedSource
     
    User
    The User class represents a user entity in the system.
    UserLoginPage
    The UserLoginPage class provides a login interface for users to access their accounts.
    UserNameRecognizer
     
    UserRole
    Allow user to choose a role
    WelcomeLoginPage
